Plot summary:
Released from prison, a juvenile delinquent (played by the pop idol Aya Matsuura) has been recruited by a clandestine police organization to stop a plot by student radicals to create anarchy in Japan.  Armed with a hi-tech steel yo-yo and with a new name (Saki Asamiya), she must infiltrate in an elite high school to find the terrorists but finds that an even more sinister plan is about to unfold.
